attributes.title: you will NOT believe what happened when i downloaded this app...
attributes.review: It was if Sunday afternoon and I had just gotten back from my bosses house where i was having an affair. I scrolled through my social media and noticed that Trump had launch a 2020 campaign app.👅 I quickly downloaded it.....however, as soon as it installed, I was shocked by what had happened. I got a knock on my front door and I looked through the peephole only to see Drake Bell standing on my front door step. I open the door in amazement and he shoved a paper bag over my head, grabbed me by the neck, and knocking me out. The next thing I remember is waking up in a bed surrounded by thousands of people wearing Trump masks. I immediately threw up and tried to run for the door. The door was locked. I started screaming as the people wearing Trump masks began singing ✨foreigner✨, harmonizing perfectly. I jump on to the bed and I jumped so high that I went through the top of the ceiling and out onto the roof. as the sun was beaming down on my skin I heard a voice next to me. I look to my left and there she was. Dixie Damelio. she began screaming at me the loudest I’ve ever heard anyone scream. She told me that if I didn’t vote for Trump in the 2020 election, even though I am only 15, she would rip the hair off of my head and use it to make slippers for her animals. Dixie licked my forehead as I fell asleep to her singing be happy....🤘🏻 when I woke up I was back in my bed with Melania Trump lying next to me. thank god my bow and arrow was under my pillow. i pointed it at her left shoulder. i was too slow. she grabbed my right arm with her massive man hands and took a massive bite out of my forearm. Instantly killing me. I am writing this review from my grave. When I downloaded this app, I did not know I was going to die. Peace and blessings.👁👄👁

attributes.title: Froze my phone and drained battery so quickly
attributes.review: Downloaded this app excited to get some news. I was so devastated. My phone kept freezing every 2 minutes, and when I tried to close the app it would not all me to. Not only that, it is so poorly made and difficult to navigate. The layout is not aesthetically pleasing at all and clearly was designed by an amateur. I am so disappointed. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT WILL DRAIN YOUR BATTERY AND FREEZE YOUR PHONE

attributes.title: App disabled my phone and stole
attributes.review:
This app crashed my phone!!! I reinstalled it three times and three times when I had the app open my phone froze and then went black. And it got REALLY HOT. Like I thought it was gonna melt the case. And when I finally got it back on the battery had died more than fifty percent!!

WHAT IS THIS APP DOING TO MY PHONE?????????? WHAT IS IT DOING WHILE THE SCREEN IS BLACK AND I HAVE NO CONTROL OVER IT?????

President Trump said he would make America Great Still but AT. WHAT. COST??

attributes.title: It doesnt work!
attributes.review: This app still doesnt work properly. Please fix it!!

attributes.title: please read, IMPORTANT
attributes.review: trump literally spit in my child’s face, and now she has herpes. what he did was unforgivable, he pushed my disabled child down the stairs and used her as a step stool. short ass couldn’t even reach the top shelf and decided to use my child for it. he then proceeded to pop his zits in my face getting disgusting pus pie all over me. would rate 0/10 if available. horrible person AND app.

attributes.title: GLITCHED MY PHONE
attributes.review: ugh i downloaded this app and it glitched my phone . i thought it would be cool . BUT NO . i can’t even stand this anymore my phone is now broken . i wouldn’t recommend downloading if you want your phone to work . have a good day 🧚‍♀️🙈😘✨😍
